skills.desc:
Has an 80% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn. 

[Passive Effect]

Whenever an enemy loses a [Sleep] debuff placed by this Skill, has a 50% chance of replacing it with a [Fear] debuff for 1 turn instead.

skills.desc:
Places a [Sleep] debuff on an ally for 1 turn. 

Heals that ally by 50% of their MAX HP and fills their Turn Meter by 50% whenever the [Sleep] debuff expires or gets removed.

Heals that ally by 100% and completely fills their Turn Meter if the [Sleep] debuff is lost due to taking damage from an enemy.
skills.name: Revitalizing Rest
